name: Wormzilla - Director's Cut
description:
To escape the lab, Wormy will need to evolve —at the right time!
With legs he's able to jump. With arms he can pull levers. But be careful, as he grows he becomes bigger and heavier.

Left/Right arrows to move.
Space or Up arrow to jump.

If you manage to step on every button, and pull the lever, the door will open!

This game is a polished version of Wormzilla, made for Godot Wild Jam.
